txt.en: Digging beneath the thawed soil, you uncover an old dwarf-crafted relic. Something about this ancient relic strikes you as unmistakeably Zhélruka. They may be of great value. You should search for more of these and show them to one of their kind.
You should bring the relics to Hórin in Skarháld.
Relics buried in the Withered Heath may hold importance to the Zhélruka's past endeavours in the Grey Mountains.
You should recover Zhélruka relics from thawed soil on the Withered Heath.

You present the strange, old relics to Hórin.\n\n'King Ilkún's company. Aye, we tell tales of those he sent to the Withered Heath to seek the Thafar-gathol and his forebear's remains. Many died there when the glacier known as the Anvil split open and dragons poured out! These are relics that should be remembered and praised. I will ensure they are studied and proudly displayed once Ered Mithrin is reclaimed. You have done a good service to the Zhélruka.'
